p: Agar disc diffusion method revealed growth inhibition zones with the following EOs: C. zeylanicum, C. citratus, L. cubeba, M. piperita, O. basilicum, P. graveolens and S. aromaticum. Antibacterial activity was revealed also testing the five mixtures. No inhibition zone was observed with the remaining oils and the negative control. E. coli tested against amoxycillin-clavulanic acid resulted sensitive with an inhibition zone of 20 mm and a MIC value of 0.008/0.004 mg/mL.
